nodes.text: A Togrutan male musician lived in the galaxy during the First Order/Resistance War, embarking for the first time aboard the MPO-1400 Star Cruiser Halcyon. While traveling on the Chandrila Star Line cruiser, he met a galactic superstar and sought to impress her with his musical skills. A talented singer and guitarist, he hoped to shed his identity as the "alien next door" and become a successful performer.

The Torgutan musician is set to appear in the upcoming Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser, an immersive hotel and entertainment experience scheduled to launch in 2022 at the Walt Disney World Resort. In audition sides posted for the character by The Walt Disney Company, the musician composes an impromptu love song for the superstar with the help of the Halcyon's guests.
